name: BB Barrage
overview: A 2 player only vs shooting game in which you have to shoot BBs/pellets at the other player. Like in the majority of these games, the winner is determined after so many rounds with the player with the most victories being the eventual winner. This was developed by William Chin and published in the following: • COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1988/08 (Issue #62) • Best of Gazette 1988 (Disk Issue) It was also published in 1993 in Europe under the name Ball Barricade (with SLIGHTLY altered graphics) by Digital Talk in Digital Talk #003 (26.09.1993) which was a European based disk only magazine.
